message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.MM

The paper proposes a new authentication scheme that combines behavioural biometric gestures with challenge-response based cognitive authentication. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with authentication and protection against attacks. The paper also discusses the usability aspect of the proposed scheme, which suggests a human-computer interaction (cs.HC) angle. Additionally, the use of touch screens and biometric gestures may fall under the category of computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV) or multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also discusses the potential vulnerabilities and attacks on the proposed scheme, which may fall under the category of cybercrime (cs.CY) or social and information networks (cs.SI).
